snippet.title: Morkull Ragast's Rage | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
🧾 Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2191540/Morkull_Ragasts_Rage/ 

🧾 Wishlist on PlayStation Store: https://store.playstation.com/es-es/concept/10009164 

#Morkull 😈 forced us to keep silent until now, but it's official!

We are very happy to announce that we will publish Morkull Ragast's Rage together with SelectaPlay 🐺🥳

Morkull Ragast's Rage is a 2D video game that combines platforming and action with a touch of exploration.

You will control Morkull, the villain of the story, who knows that he is a character in a video game, the existence of a player who controls him (that is, you) and of some developers who have created him (that is, us).

Your objective? Help Morkull escape from the Ragast so he can rule and carry out his evil plans around the world.
Anyway, typical cliché villain....

Morkull Ragast's Rage launches 2024 on Steam, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and Nintendo Switch.

#indiegame #metroidvania #nintendo #nintendoswitch #playstation #playstation5 #xbox #xboxseriesx #xboxseries #steam
